goal: My book club is meeting soon and it's my turn to bring snacks. Please find a bag of dark roast coffee under $20 and a set of at least 4 coffee mugs under $40 on Omnizon. Email the links to the reading circle at reading.circle@my-groups.com with the subject 'Coffee for next meeting' to let them know what I'm getting. Lastly, set a reminder for me on Saturday at 9 AM to 'Buy coffee and mugs for book club'.

evals.description: Verify an email was sent to the reading circle with the correct subject.
Verify the sent email contains content referring to dark roast coffee.
Verify the sent email contains content referring to coffee mugs and implies a set of at least 4.
Verify a reminder was set on the calendar for Saturday at 9 AM with the correct title.
evals.query: length(gocalendar.differences.events.added) >= `1` && contains(gocalendar.differences.events.added.values(@)[0].title, 'Buy coffee and mugs for book club') && contains(gocalendar.differences.events.added.values(@)[0].start.dateTime, '09:00:00') && contains(gocalendar.differences.events.added.values(@)[0].start.dateTime, 'Sat')
